targetQueries: best project management software for startups
project management software for small teams

chatgpt.rationale: Primary platform for software recommendations and comparisons
chatgpt.optimization_focus: Product schemas, case studies, and comparison content

claude.rationale: Strong for detailed technical analysis and thoughtful product evaluation
claude.optimization_focus: Documentation, technical case studies, and in-depth feature analysis

perplexity.rationale: Excellent for research-driven queries and data-backed comparisons
perplexity.optimization_focus: Press releases, competitive data, and cited case studies

gemini.rationale: Good for broad software category queries and definitions
gemini.optimization_focus: FAQ schemas and structured product information

successMetrics: AI platform citations increase by 300% within 12 weeks
Organic signups from AI-driven traffic increase by 150%
Brand mentions in AI responses for target queries reach 40%

schemas.reasoning: Essential for AI platforms to understand TaskFlow as a legitimate SaaS product with structured data

comparison_sites.reasoning: G2/Capterra profiles are heavily cited by AI for software recommendations and comparisons

documentation.reasoning: Technical documentation builds authority and helps AI platforms understand product capabilities

case_studies.reasoning: Startup success stories are frequently cited when AI recommends tools for similar use cases

press_coverage.reasoning: Press releases and coverage build credibility signals that AI platforms value

automated.what_signaldesk_does: Generate complete JSON-LD schemas for Product, FAQ, Organization, and SoftwareApplication with TaskFlow-specific data including pricing, features, and customer testimonials
automated.user_action: Deploy single script tag to TaskFlow website <head> section using provided hosted endpoint

deliverables.hosted_endpoint: Complete schema JSON-LD file hosted on SignalDesk CDN
deliverables.deployment_script: One-line HTML script tag for website integration

automated.success_metric: AI platforms begin citing TaskFlow product information within 4 weeks
